metadata.description: Standardized test questions with ground truth for OPERA evaluation

complexity_2hop.question: What is the capital of the country where Toyota is headquartered?
reasoning_steps: Toyota is headquartered in Japan
The capital of Japan is Tokyo

complexity_2hop.question: Who directed the movie that won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020?
reasoning_steps: Parasite won Best Picture in 2020
Bong Joon-ho directed Parasite

complexity_3hop.question: What is the population of the capital city of the country where IKEA was founded?
reasoning_steps: IKEA was founded in Sweden
The capital of Sweden is Stockholm
Stockholm's population is approximately 975,000

complexity_3hop.question: What year was the university founded where the creator of the Python programming language earned his degree?
reasoning_steps: Python was created by Guido van Rossum
Guido van Rossum earned his degree from University of Amsterdam
University of Amsterdam was founded in 1632

complexity_4hop.question: What is the GDP of the country where the headquarters of the company that acquired LinkedIn is located?
reasoning_steps: LinkedIn was acquired by Microsoft
Microsoft is headquartered in Redmond, Washington
Redmond is in the United States
The US GDP is approximately $25 trillion

complexity_4hop.question: What language is primarily spoken in the country where the company that owns WhatsApp has its largest office outside the US?
reasoning_steps: WhatsApp is owned by Meta (Facebook)
Meta's largest office outside the US is in London
London is in the United Kingdom
English is primarily spoken in the UK

temporal_reasoning.question: Who was the CEO of Microsoft when Google was founded?
reasoning_steps: Google was founded in 1998
Bill Gates was CEO of Microsoft in 1998

temporal_reasoning.question: What was the population of New York City when the Empire State Building was completed?
reasoning_steps: Empire State Building was completed in 1931
NYC population in 1931 was approximately 6.9 million

comparative_reasoning.question: Which is older: the university where Einstein taught or the university where Hawking taught?
reasoning_steps: Einstein taught at Princeton University
Hawking taught at University of Cambridge
Cambridge was founded in 1209
Princeton was founded in 1746
